name: Tombs and Hecatombs
description:
Never could quite finish games I started so I joined the Spooktober "Sacrifice" gamejam to get  a drive and made a lil game. Standard FPS controls, WASD, Mouse and Jump.

Sacrifice one of your body parts to progress forward, giving you debuffs like reduced vision or having to hop on one leg.

Face a great demon to claim your ultimate reward for your sacrifice.
